mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_role (id, `name`, name_remark, created_time, modified_time, `status`, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update t_sys_role set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_remark = #{nameRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, name_remark, created_time, modified_time, `status`, is_delete from t_sys_role
